last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Newhart
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the midst of a town meeting, a Japanese visitor announces his intentions to purchase the entire town and turn the land into a gigantic golf course. Everyone but Dick is thrilled and sells out.

name: Newhart
overview: Dick Loudon and his wife Joanna decide to leave life in New York City and buy a little inn in Vermont. Dick is a how-to book writer, who eventually becomes a local TV celebrity as host of "Vermont Today." George Utley is the handyman at the inn and Leslie Vanderkellen is the maid, with ambitions of being an Olympic Ski champion; she is later replaced by her cousin Stephanie, an heiress who hates her job. Her boyfriend is Dick's yuppie TV producer, Michael Harris. There are many other quirky characters in this fictional little town, including Dick's neighbors Larry, Darryl, and Darryl...three brothers who buy the Minuteman Cafe from Kirk Devane. Besides sharing a name, Darryl and Darryl never speak.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 25, 1982 to April 10, 1983.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 17, 1983 to April 16, 1984.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The third season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 15, 1984 to May 27, 1985.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The fourth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 30, 1985 to May 12, 1986.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The fifth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 29, 1986 to April 13, 1987.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The sixth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 14, 1987 to May 9, 1988.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: The seventh season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 24, 1988 to May 22, 1989.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: The eighth and final season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 18, 1989 to May 21, 1990.

episodes.name: In the Beginning...
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna Loudon purchase the Stratford Inn, a remnant of colonial times in scenic Vermont. Their caretaker, George Utley, and his family have tended the inn for decades. Dick hires a maid, Leslie, and meets their next-door neighbor (and habitual liar) Kirk. The inn opens for business amid myriad start-up problems.

episodes.name: Mrs. Newton's Body Lies A'Mould'ring in the Grave
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna learn that there's a body buried in the basement. The Loudons try to get the body moved to the church cemetery, only to find that she was a witch.

episodes.name: Hail to the Councilman
episodes.overview: Dick gets his hopes up after two city officials suggest he run for town council.

episodes.name: Shall We Gather at the River?
episodes.overview: Joanna falls through the ice at the annual River Day festival. Dick is on the outs when Joanna blames him for everything bad that happens in her life.

episodes.name: This Probably is Condemned
episodes.overview: Dick and the gang pitch in to help Kirk get the Minuteman up to code after its shut down.

episodes.name: No Tigers at the Circus
episodes.overview: Dick spirals into a profound depression after the Stratford is denied in its bid to be classified an historic landmark.

episodes.name: The Perfect Match
episodes.overview: Leslie's high school sweetheart returns from far off places to ask for her hand in marriage, to Kirk's obvious displeasure.

episodes.name: Some are Born Writers...Others Have Writers Thrust Upon Them
episodes.overview: Dick praises an aspiring writer's work to avoid hurting her feelings. The writer's enthusiastic husband quits his job to allow his wife to write full time. It's up to Dick to secure her an agent and teach her to write, all before their savings runs out in a month and a half.

episodes.name: No Room at the Inn
episodes.overview: The inn is swamped when 24 guests are snowed in on Christmas Eve. While Kirk tries to keep the guests entertained, Dick tries to find room for a traveller named Joseph and his pregnant wife.

episodes.name: The Senator's Wife Was Indiscreet
episodes.overview: A U.S. Senator's wife checks into the inn and holds a press conference to announce she's divorcing her inattentive husband.

episodes.name: Sprained Dreams
episodes.overview: Dick jeopardizes Leslie's lifelong dream of becoming a world-class skier when he accidentally falls on her.

episodes.name: The Way We Thought We Were
episodes.overview: George's old flame visits the inn. Both are disappointed when the other isn't as they remember.

episodes.name: The Visitors
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna cant wait for their 'fun' friends to visit, but soon become perturbed after their friends treat the Loudons not as friends, but innkeepers.

episodes.name: What is This Thing Called Lust?
episodes.overview: Leslie's attractive cousin Stephanie visits Vermont to settle her emotions as she nears her wedding day. Stephanie soon finds herself lusting after Kirk.

episodes.name: Breakfast Theater
episodes.overview: Washed-up comic Manny Silver visits the Stratford, reminding Dick of the 'debt' he owes Manny for starting his writing career. Manny shames Dick into letting him perform in the inn, over Joanna's strenuous objections.

episodes.name: Ricky Nelson, Up Your Nose
episodes.overview: Kirk goes into the hospital for surgery to remove a foreign object from his nose, leaving Larry, Darryl and a very svelte Darryl in charge of the cafe. Dick and Joanna, about to go to New York for a writer's conference have to bail out the boys when an unexpected crowd turns up at the cafe.

episodes.name: A View from the Bench
episodes.overview: Dick, Kirk, and George go to Boston to use their bench passes for a Celtics game. Dick loses his pass. Meanwhile, Leslie and Joanna wait at the inn for incoming guest, Daniel J. Travanti.

episodes.name: The Boy Who Cried Goat
episodes.overview: When Kirk's cafe is robbed, his history of deception comes back to haunt him as the insurance investigator refuses to believe his story.

episodes.name: Heaven Knows Mr. Utley
episodes.overview: George is the town laughingstock when he claims to have spied an UFO.

episodes.name: You're Homebody 'til Somebody Loves You
episodes.overview: Dick inadvertently insults Joanna, calling her a homebody. Joanna takes a job with a travel agency in an attempt to assert herself.

episodes.name: Grandma, What a Big Mouth You Have
episodes.overview: Kirk's grandmother visits on the same night he finally gets a date with Leslie.

episodes.name: I Enjoy Being a Guy
episodes.overview: Dick loves being 'just one of the guys' when Chester and Jim invite him to join their golf foursome. Dick is distressed to find that their gambling habit and lousy golfing abilities make him the big winner. Dick tries to figure out a way to give the money back without breaking 'the guy code'.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The first season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 25, 1982 to April 10, 1983.

episodes.name: It Happened One Afternoon (1)
episodes.overview: Dick travels to New York to interview famous starlet Erica Chase for a potential biography. Joanna hires Stephanie to be the new maid over her parents objections.

episodes.name: It Happened One Afternoon (2)
episodes.overview: Man-hungry Erica Chase literally chases Dick across her hotel suite to try to bed him. Stephanie's overbearing father flies to Vermont to convince her to come back home with him.

episodes.name: Animal Attractions
episodes.overview: George finds a stray dog, 'Lucky'. Stephanie's husband drops by to find out why she left him.

episodes.name: The Stratford Wives
episodes.overview: Joanna creates a stir at a potluck dinner by breaking a long-standing tradition whereby men eat in the dining room, women in the kitchen.

episodes.name: The Girl From Manhattan
episodes.overview: Joanna convinces Dick to use a play he'd written years before in a local production. Friction develops when Dick casts her, not in the role of 'Joanna', but rather 'Joanna's Mother'.

episodes.name: Don't Rain on My Parade
episodes.overview: Joanna is swamped when Dick volunteers her to serve Thanksgiving dinner for over 100 people, including her parents. George is upset when his Thanksgiving parade is ruined by rain.

episodes.name: Lady & the Tramps
episodes.overview: Stephanie stumbles onto Larry, Darryl and Darryl's home when she's lost in a winter snowstorm.

episodes.name: The Man Who Came Forever
episodes.overview: With a deadline looming, Dick can't get any work done on his latest book due to constant interruptions. Kirk wants to build a miniature golf course, George is worried about retirement, and the Stratford plays host to a guest who just wont leave.

episodes.name: The Looks of Love
episodes.overview: Kirk helms a singles club in the hopes of finding the perfect girlfriend.

episodes.name: Kirk Goes for the Juggler
episodes.overview: Kirk thinks he's met the girl of his dreams, but isn't sure how he feels when he discovers she's a clown.

episodes.name: A Jug of Wine, a Loaf of Bread and POW
episodes.overview: Stephanie and Joanna attend a poetry reading at Dartmouth where a professor has a special interest in Joanna. Dick unleashes his 'Irish temper' when said professor makes a pass at Joanna.

episodes.name: Cats
episodes.overview: Stephanie's old boyfriend stays at the inn with his new wife, Stephanie's old best friend Tish Ellison. The sparks fly when Steph and Tish get reacquainted. Kirk throws a dinner party for Dick, Joanna, Cindy and himself.

episodes.name: Curious George at the Firehouse
episodes.overview: George becomes a volunteer fireman, determined to shed his image as the town boob. George loses the keys to the fire truck just as the town's first fire in five years erupts.

episodes.name: Book Beat
episodes.overview: After guesting on a literary discussion television program, Dick is tabbed to be its new host. Dick's first program gets off to a bad start when he's scheduled guest doesn't show up, and the fill-in, Col. Lloyd Mennenger, is a little off-kilter.

episodes.name: Kirk Pops the Question
episodes.overview: Kirk relies on Dick and George to decide whether he should propose to Cindy.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Kirk is up in arms when a fast food franchise announces plans to build a restaurant in the town.

episodes.name: Kirk Ties One On
episodes.overview: Kirk's can't wait for his wedding to Cindy, until the wedding actually starts and Kirk faints during the ceremony. .

episodes.name: Go, Grandma, Go
episodes.overview: Kirk's grandmother visits, loaning her car to Kirk and Cindy for their honeymoon. Kirk realizes there's trouble when he's arrested for possession of a stolen vehicle.

episodes.name: Leave It to the Beavers
episodes.overview: Dick is dumbfounded when George's club, the Beavers, reject him for membership. Kirk and Cindy have their first fight. A man with an imaginary wife stays at the inn.

episodes.name: Vermont Today
episodes.overview: Dick gets his own television program 'Vermont Today'. Originally scheduled to interview the president of the university of Vermont, Dick instead hosts a competition for the world's smallest horse. Stephanie meets Michael Harris, the man of her dreams.

episodes.name: Send Her, Ella
episodes.overview: Stephanie is disappointed when she has to watch the inn instead of participating in the Maple Syrup beauty contest, so she quickly crafts a disguise and goes as Miss Inez Velasco, leaving the inn in the hands of a guest.

episodes.name: New Faces of 1951
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna plan a birthday party for George after he reveals he's never had one. Dick calls everyone he can think of, but no one can make it. In desperation, Dick calls up George's old army buddies.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The second season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 17, 1983 to April 16, 1984.

episodes.name: Tell a Lie, Get a Check
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna return from vacation to find Kirk and Cindy have moved away and Kirk has asked Dick to sell the cafe. Michael teaches Dick the only way he'll be able to sell the rundown cafe is by stretching the truth.

episodes.name: Twenty Year Itch
episodes.overview: Joanna has a date, set 20 years earlier, with a former beau in New York. A jealous Dick tags along. An awful trumpet player serenades the inn while he prepares for an audition.

episodes.name: A Hunting We Will Go
episodes.overview: Dick, George, Chester, Jim & Michael go duck hunting on the opening day of hunting season to film a television special. They're all stranded when Michael forgets to tie off the boat. With death eminent, they all discuss their regrets in life, including Dick's admission that he always wanted to play Prof. Henry Hill in 'The Music Man'.

episodes.name: Miss Stephanie
episodes.overview: Larry misinterprets a comment by Stephanie and makes her the object of his undying love.

episodes.name: But Seriously, Beavers
episodes.overview: Dick's jokes at a Beaver Lodge roast for George are a hit with everyone except the guest of honor, spurring George to consider leaving the inn. Stephanie sells cosmetic kits.

episodes.name: Tickets, Please
episodes.overview: Dick throws a fit and is sentenced for outstanding parking tickets on the day of a big Celtics game. Stephanie, who's never been punished for anything in her life, can't bring herself to tell Dick that she's the one who got the tickets.

episodes.name: Poor Reception
episodes.overview: After Michael is roped into hiring Stephanie as WPIV's receptionist, he can't bring himself to fire her. Meanwhile, Joanna hires Harley Estin as a temporary maid.

episodes.name: The Fan
episodes.overview: Dick is hounded by an obsessive fan who goes as far as moving into the inn and starting a Dick Loudon fan club.

episodes.name: Happy Trails to You
episodes.overview: Dick is dragged into court when a farmer claims Dick plagiarized his work.

episodes.name: Georgie's Girl
episodes.overview: George panics when his girlfriend starts talking marriage. Stephanie tries to pass the driver's test.

episodes.name: Pillow Fight
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna squabble over 'creative differences' when they collaborate on a book on pillows. Larry and the boys stay at the inn while their cabin is being fumigated.

episodes.name: Local Hero
episodes.overview: George is a local hero after he saves two boys from drowning.

episodes.name: Dick Gets Larry's Goat
episodes.overview: The Loudons feud with Larry and the Darryls after Dick alerts animal control to the brother's illegal, and annoying goat. Simply hilarious.

episodes.name: Once I Had a Secret Love
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna spar after Dick is 'riddled' with doubts when Joanna is set to appear on his Valentines Day Show.

episodes.name: Lady in Wading
episodes.overview: Stephanie falls for a visiting television executive, forcing her to choose between him and Michael.

episodes.name: Look Homeward, Stephanie
episodes.overview: Stephanie returns home for a brief visit, but she's soon convinced to stay when she's overwhelmed with presents. Michael is astonished by Steph's transformation to a spoiled brat. Dick tries to beat Joanna's annoying knack for guessing exactly what her birthday present will be.

episodes.name: My Fair Larry
episodes.overview: Joanna undertakes a massive project when she agrees to try to spruce up Larry, Darryl & Darryl and the Minuteman cafe.

episodes.name: You're Nobody 'til Somebody Hires You
episodes.overview: After demanding extravagent perks, Michael is fired from WPIV. Bev replaces him with Dick. An unemployed Michael falls to pieces, and Dick is exasperated with his new job duties.

episodes.name: Out With the New, Inn With the Old
episodes.overview: George is upset when Dick and Harley Estin try to remodel the garage so it looks like the carriage house it was originally built as several centuries ago. Joanna hosts a rummage sale.

episodes.name: R.I.P. Off
episodes.overview: Harley goes to jail after he is tricked into selling swamp grave plots. Michael, Dick and Joanna set up an ""Abscam"" to catch the real criminal.

episodes.name: The Prodigal Darryl
episodes.overview: Darryl runs off after he and his brother's win a contest for writing the best commerical jingle, netting them $30,000. Dick, Larry & the remaining Darryl search for the missing brother. Meanwhile, Joanna decorates the inn in Christmas decor for a Christmas card photo.

episodes.name: What Makes Dick Run
episodes.overview: Dick and his crew have VITA fever when the local broadcasting awards, the VITAs, are scheduled to be announced. Dick, inspired by a puppet show put on by Larry and the boys for an ailing Stephanie, decides to jazz up his act to win a VITA nomination.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The third season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 15, 1984 to May 27, 1985.

episodes.name: Pirate Pete
episodes.overview: Dick fills in on a kiddie TV program for its ailing host, Pirate Pete. Dick is appalled at Pete's commercialism and inadvertantly gets the programs cancelled. Dick tries his hardest to get Pete reinstated. Meanwhile, George plays a practical joke on Stephanie, adjusting her scale up two pounds.

episodes.name: The Way We Ought to Be
episodes.overview: Michael and Steph break up when Michael realizes he's tired of Stephanie's demanding ways. Dick has difficulties with the WPIV staff when they're slow to direct his show.

episodes.name: Summa Cum Larry
episodes.overview: Dick covers for Larry when he enrolls in night school and doesn't want the Darryls to know he's improving himself. Joanna obsesses when a travel guide lowers the inn's rating.

episodes.name: Oh, That Morocco
episodes.overview: A lonely Joanna becomes best friends with Stephanie who insists on a group vacation to lovely Morocco.

episodes.name: Candidate Larry
episodes.overview: Larry runs for Mayor.

episodes.name: Locks, Stocks, and Noodlehead
episodes.overview: Stephanie's father visits the inn with the news that he's left his wife. The town celebrates Colonial Days, an authentic recreation of colonial times.

episodes.name: The Geezers in the Band
episodes.overview: When Dick's old college jazz band reunites at the inn, he finds that expectations often excede reality.

episodes.name: The Shape of Things
episodes.overview: Stephanie and Joanna open an aerobics club. Problems present themselves when Stephanie appoints herself as the manager and relegates Joanna to custodial duties.

episodes.name: Write to Privacy
episodes.overview: Joanna and Steph are furious with Michael after they peek at his diary and find out what he really thinks of them.

episodes.name: Still the Beavers
episodes.overview: Dick convinces George to quit the Beaver Lodge after the Beavers cheat George out of a prize rightfully his. George starts up a rival lodge to get back at the Beavers.

episodes.name: Much Ado About Mitch
episodes.overview: George joins a Big Brother program and is dismayed when his young protege Mitch is awestruck by Dick's fast paced lifestyle. Michael and Stephanie use a Oujia board.

episodes.name: Look Ma, No Talent
episodes.overview: Michael begins shirking his duties and risks his job when he tries to find a talent to impress his mother.

episodes.name: Larry's Dead, Long Live Larry
episodes.overview: Larry dedicates his life to Dick when he believes Dick brought him back from the dead.

episodes.name: Stephanie Nightingale
episodes.overview: Stephanie must care for the hotel staff and guests when a measels epidemic sweeps the inn.

episodes.name: The Stratford Horror Picture Show
episodes.overview: The Loudons are spooked when the ghost of Sarah Newton (episode #2) returns to haunt the inn.

episodes.name: I Do, Okay
episodes.overview: Joanna and a decidedly unenthusiastic Dick decide to renew their wedding vows to celebrate their wedding anniversary.

episodes.name: The Snowmen Cometh
episodes.overview: The town panics when it appears the annual Snow Carnival will be cancelled due to a lack of snow. Larry, Darryl & Darryl request $2,000 to make it snow.

episodes.name: Will the Real Dick Loudon Please Shut Up?
episodes.overview: Dick is thrilled when a production company expresses interest in making 'How to be a Plumber' into a video. His elation quickly dissipates when the producers decide to recast 'Dick Loudon' because of Dick's shifty eyes and stammer.

episodes.name: He Ain't Human, He's My Cousin
episodes.overview: George meets his only living relative, Cousin Eugene.

episodes.name: Dwight Schmidlapp Is Not a Quitter
episodes.overview: On a lark, Dick submits his newest book to his publisher under the pseudonym he used when he first started writing, Dwight Schmidlapp, only to find it rejected. Dick sinks into a funk when he realizes he's 'coasting' in his writing career.

episodes.name: Torn Between Three Brothers
episodes.overview: A jilted fiancee staying at the inn gets a job at the Minuteman cafe. She unwittingly encourages the affections of both Darryls but rejects them for the more vocal Larry. George organizes a citywide campaign when Michael pulls Barnaby Jones off the air in favor of The Secret Lives of Platinum Gold Dancers.

episodes.name: Baby, I'm Your Handyman
episodes.overview: George worries that a new girlfriend, actress Loretta Dupris is only dating him to make use of his handyman skills. TV Producer J.J. buys a Victorian mansion and plans to bulldoze it to erect a space needle.

episodes.name: Replaceable You
episodes.overview: Secretary Alma amazes Dick, which she fills in as producer.

episodes.name: Pre-Nups
episodes.overview: The Loudons, George, Steph and Michael are invited to Vanderkellen mansion for Arthur's birthday. Art insists Michael sign a pre-nuptial agreement that he refuses to do. Stephanie fears Michael's only dating her for her money. Dick worries when he breaks a music box given to Arthur by Winston Churchill.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The fourth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 30, 1985 to May 12, 1986.

episodes.name: Co-Hostess Twinkie
episodes.overview: Dick is stuck with a perky, brainless co-hostess for his new program 'On the Town'. Meanwhile, Larry and the Darryls name their new pig 'Miss Stephanie' much to the real Stephanie's dismay.

episodes.name: Camp Stephanie
episodes.overview: Stephanie has her hands full when she temporarily leads a group of 'Ranger Girls'. While Steph tries to teach them about coming-out parties and makeup, the girls want to learn survival techniques. Meanwhile, Dick and Joanna endure George's wood carving, Mount Stratford.

episodes.name: Dick the Kid
episodes.overview: Dick heads west to pursue his dream of being a cowboy.

episodes.name: High Fidelity
episodes.overview: Dick endures the townspeople's pity when Joanna and new friend Hal are suspected by everyone of having an affair.

episodes.name: Desperately Desiring Susan (1)
episodes.overview: Michael becomes enamored with temporary office secretary Susan.

episodes.name: Desperately Desiring Susan (2)
episodes.overview: Michael struggles with his desire for Susan, versus his passion for Stephanie.

episodes.name: My Two and Only
episodes.overview: A new friend threatens Larry's position as family leader.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving for the Memories
episodes.overview: The Newhart family travels to Vanderkellen mansion for Thanksgiving, but is forced to leave prematurely when Stephanie finds her parents threw away her favorite toy.

episodes.name: Utley, Can You Spend a Dime
episodes.overview: Dick convinces a reluctant George to live a little and spend some of his $50,000 fortune. Meanwhile the town believes Dick to be destitute after a check bounces due to a bank error.

episodes.name: Sweet and Sour Charity
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna have an opportunity to shed their 'town newcomer' status when Dick's asked to run a fundraiser for the local library. Dick, the former advertising executive, finds it a hard pill to swallow when his idea is rejected and Joanna's is unanimously applauded.

episodes.name: Everybody Ought to Have a Maid
episodes.overview: Stephanie worries she might lose her job after she breaks a toe and her temporary replacement is 'better than Mary Poppins'.

episodes.name: Saturday in New York with George
episodes.overview: Dick and George attend a literary party in New York. Dick worries that George won't fit in with the high class partygoers and is stunned and jealous when George is the life of the party.

episodes.name: Love Letters in the Mud
episodes.overview: Michael helps Larry court the girl of his dreams. Joanna holds Dick responsible for his actions in her dream.

episodes.name: First of the Belles
episodes.overview: Dick's old college sweetheart visits the inn for a weekend of skiing, leaving Joanna worried that Dick may want to rekindle an old flame.

episodes.name: It's My Party and I'll Die if I Want To
episodes.overview: Cousin Ned Vanderkellen's 100th birthday party goes smoothly... until Cousin Ned drops dead.

episodes.name: Chimes They Are a Changin'
episodes.overview: George sets out to repair the town's cracked bell tower, even after the town votes him down. Michael rents The Wizard of Oz to overcome his fear of wind.

episodes.name: Unfriendly Persuasion
episodes.overview: Dick tries to help Joanna overcome her fear of eye doctors. George feels slighted by Stephanie after she blows him off in favor of shopping.

episodes.name: Jail, Jail, the Gang's All Here
episodes.overview: Larry, Darryl & Darryl ask Dick to represent them after they're arrested for kidnapping a neighbor's cow.

episodes.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Loudon
episodes.overview: Dick gains an unwanted reputation as an acerbic wit after verbally assaulting an inept guest.

episodes.name: Fun with Dick and Joanna
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna find that spontaneity isn't all it's cracked up to be after Dick's spontaneous plans land them in a fleabag motel for the worst night of their lives.

episodes.name: Night Moves
episodes.overview: Dick tries to find someplace to sleep after Joanna throws him out.

episodes.name: Harris Ankles PIV for Web Post
episodes.overview: Michael interviews for a network job. George finds a 'Duck Rock'.

episodes.name: Good-Bye and Good Riddance, Mr. Chips
episodes.overview: Dick enrolls in a typing class, only to find that the teacher, Mr. Brooney, is the same tyrant he had for a sixth-grade teacher.

episodes.name: Much to Do Without Muffin
episodes.overview: Michael is lost when Stephanie goes away for the weekend. Desperate, he goes to a Beaver Lodge dinner with George and is the life of the party.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The fifth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 29, 1986 to April 13, 1987.

episodes.name: Here's to You Mrs. Loudon
episodes.overview: Joanna has trouble dumping a 16-year-old boy with a crush on her. George searches for a nickname.

episodes.name: Prima Darryl
episodes.overview: Larry is ousted as leader after he discovers that Darryl is actually the oldest of the three.

episodes.name: Inn This Corner
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna love the fun-loving couple staying at the Stratford...until they announce they're opening a posh new inn down the street.

episodes.name: Me and My Gayle
episodes.overview: George reunites with an old high school flame.

episodes.name: Reading, Writing, and Rating Points
episodes.overview: Michael steals an idea for a new program from a student in his television production class.

episodes.name: Vintage Stephanie
episodes.overview: Stephanie panics when she discovers she's no longer 'blossoming'. It takes Larry, Darryl, and Darryl's sage advice to break her depression. George buys blue jeans.

episodes.name: Take Me to Your Loudon
episodes.overview: Michael seeks to create an Orson Welles-style panic when he programs The War of the Worlds on Halloween night. Dick desperately tries to control the panicked guests at the inn's costume party.

episodes.name: Till Depth Do Us Part (1)
episodes.overview: Synopsis coming soon

episodes.name: Till Depth Do Us Part (2)
episodes.overview: Synopsis coming soon

episodes.name: Telethon Man
episodes.overview: Dick hosts a 48-hour telethon when WPIV is about to go under.

episodes.name: Laugh at My Wife Please
episodes.overview: Joanna delivers Dick's unfunny speech when she's picked to give historical presentations to tour groups. George babysits the Darryls while Larry vacations.

episodes.name: Support Your Local Shifflet
episodes.overview: Dick encourages Officer Shifflet to go on strike after the town refuses to give him a raise.

episodes.name: My Three Dads
episodes.overview: Larry, Darryl & Darryls announce their plans to adopt a child. Little do they suspect their 'child' will be 18-years-old.

episodes.name: A Friendship That Will Last a Lunchtime
episodes.overview: Dick's former co-host Buffy Denver visits the inn and strikes up a friendship with Stephanie after discovering they have so much in common.

episodes.name: Presence of Malice
episodes.overview: Dick has a showdown with television critic Curtis Bilgray after Bilgray writes several negative reviews of 'Vermont Today'. Larry and the Darryls become cult figures after finding a pancake with Paul Anka's face on it.

episodes.name: Would You Buy a Used Car From This Handyman?
episodes.overview: George decides to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a used car salesman.

episodes.name: The Buck Stops Here
episodes.overview: Dick becomes the town pariah after he inadvertently kills the town's good-luck charm, The Great White Buck.

episodes.name: Attention WPIV Shoppers
episodes.overview: Dick is roped into co-hosting a home shopping show with Stephanie.

episodes.name: The Big Uneasy
episodes.overview: Michael is tempted by a television executive during a conference in New Orleans.

episodes.name: Draw Partner
episodes.overview: Dick gets a chance to work with his favorite illustrator, Corinne Denby, while George & Joanna eagerly await the Inn's 5,000th guest.

episodes.name: A Midseason's Night Dream
episodes.overview: This unique episode goes inside several characters' dreams. Dick dreams all his troubles have disappeared; the wicked Joanna torments Stephanie; Michael runs three major networks; and Larry guest hosts the Tonight Show.

episodes.name: Newsstruck
episodes.overview: Michael changes his entire outlook on life when he starts producing the news. George gives up on the Red Sox.

episodes.name: The Gleeless Club
episodes.overview: Dick's on the outs with Joanna when he's accepted into the town glee club and she's not.

episodes.name: Courtin' Disaster
episodes.overview: Joanna sets George up on a blind date. Everything goes great until George runs into his date's jealous ex-boyfriend.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The sixth season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 14, 1987 to May 9, 1988.

episodes.name: Town Without Pity
episodes.overview: Dick becomes the focus of the town's ire after a prisoner breaks out of jail using one of Dick's how-to manuals.

episodes.name: Apples, Apples, Apples
episodes.overview: Michael revs up the stale Ye Olde Apple Days festival, leaving George and his traditional activites in the cold..until George organizes a rival festival. Larry and his brothers stage a walk-a-thon when swampland is endangered.

episodes.name: This Blood's For You
episodes.overview: Stephanie is horrified to discover that a blood transfusion following an emergency appendectomy came from Darryl.

episodes.name: I Married Dick
episodes.overview: Dick and Joanna visit a therapist after Joanna becomes concerned that their marriage is stagnating. Stephanie is worried after discovering that Michael had large ears as a child.

episodes.name: Goonstruck
episodes.overview: Stephanie is attracted to the virile young stomemason working at the Inn.

episodes.name: I Came, I Saw, I Sat
episodes.overview: Dick's father visits the inn and, to Dick's consternation, resists all Dick's efforts to entertain him.

episodes.name: Twelve Annoyed Men...and Women
episodes.overview: Dick's patience is tried when he's elected foreman of a jury of the townspeople, who as always use their peculiar intellect to irk Dick.

episodes.name: Home for the Hollidays
episodes.overview: Joanna lands a job selling real estate. Her first sale hits a snag when her low-class clients, the Hollidays, stay at the inn while looking for a home.

episodes.name: Shoe Business Is My Life
episodes.overview: Michael goes job hunting after he's axed by WPIV.

episodes.name: George and the Old Maid
episodes.overview: The Inn's old maid, Madelyn Stone, returns after a 25 year absence to answer George's marriage proposal. Stephanie competes with Madelyn.

episodes.name: Hi, Society
episodes.overview: Dick fills in for Michael and takes Stephanie to a high society charity ball. Dick is the life of the party after Stephanie tells everyone that Dick owns a large hotel chain.

episodes.name: Cupcake on My Back
episodes.overview: Michael goes into debt after spending lavishly on Annual Cupcake Day.

episodes.name: Another Saturday Night
episodes.overview: Michael & Joanna endure a torturous evening at Larry, Darryl & Darryl's house. Dick gives a commencement speech at an exclusive school.

episodes.name: The Nice Man Cometh
episodes.overview: Dick is picked to be the sidekick for a new late night talk show hosted by an abrasive man who has it in for Dick.

episodes.name: One and a Half Million Dollar Man
episodes.overview: Wealthy socialite Scooter Drake drops by Vermont looking to purchase an inn. While Joanna shows Scooter around, Michael begins a new career as a mime.

episodes.name: The Little Match Girl
episodes.overview: While visiting Michael in a sanitarium (he's vacationing), Dick runs into illustrator Corinne Denby and invites her to collaborate with him on his next book...despite her habit of burning things.

episodes.name: Buy, Buy Blues
episodes.overview: Stephanie goes on a shopping spree while she tries to forget Michael. Meanwhile Dr. Kaiser realizes she has developed an attraction for Michael (who's been released from the sanitarium).

episodes.name: Message from Michael
episodes.overview: Michael becomes a last minute guest on Vermont Today and emerges a town favorite. The dimwitted locals hang on his every word.

episodes.name: Homes and Jo-Jo
episodes.overview: Joanna gets her own realty television show providing a great lead-in for Vermont Today. Dick loves the big ratings but can't stand Joanna's amorous co-host. Meanwhile, one of the Darryls' receives a manservant as a present.

episodes.name: Georgie & Bess
episodes.overview: George's Aunt Bess visits, shattering several of his childhood beliefs when he finds she wasn't the sweet lady he remembers. Dick and one of the Darryls play chess.

episodes.name: Murder at the Stratley
episodes.overview: The townspeople accuse Dick or murdering Joanna after her ""disappearance"" strangely fits the scenario of his first murder-mystery novel, ""Murder at the Stratley"".

episodes.name: Malling in Love Again
episodes.overview: Michael and Stephanie conduct personal interviews at the mall and realize that they're perfect together after all.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: The seventh season of Newhart aired on CBS from October 24, 1988 to May 22, 1989.

episodes.name: Don't Worry Be Pregnant
episodes.overview: Michael and a pregnant Stephanie return from a six-month cruise totally unprepared for parenthood.

episodes.name: Get Dick
episodes.overview: Dick accidentally burns down Maison Hubert while enjoying an after-dinner cigar. The Loudon's take in Hubert while he recuperates. Hubert vows he will ""get Monsieur Loudon"".

episodes.name: Poetry and Pastries
episodes.overview: Dick is chosen to judge the annual Poetry and Pastry contest. Miss Goddard, the reigning champion, uses her feminine wiles to try to influence the judging. Michael throws an all-male baby shower.

episodes.name: Utley Exposed
episodes.overview: An episode of Vermont Today on 'Hidden Shame' nets a surprise guest when George admits to a childish prank.

episodes.name: Ramblin' Michael Harris
episodes.overview: Michael quits his job at Menkey's grocery to become a lounge singer.

episodes.name: Meet Michael Vanderkellen
episodes.overview: Stephanie's mother offers to buy the newlyweds a mansion, but only if Michael changes his last name to Vanderkellen.

episodes.name: Good Lord Loudon
episodes.overview: A cash-strapped visiting dignitary makes Dick a royal Lord. After hearing of his good fortune, the townspeople's opinion of Dick jumps up a notch.

episodes.name: Cupcake in a Cage
episodes.overview: Stephanie is sent to jail after she slaps a security guard in a fit of prenatal hormones.

episodes.name: Attack of the Killer Aunt
episodes.overview: Joanna's Aunt Louise visits bearing gifts, despite her long-standing opinion that Joanna is much too good for Dick.

episodes.name: I Like You, Butt...
episodes.overview: George meets the perfect girl, except for her large rear end. Michael and Stephanie consult with a baby naming guru.

episodes.name: Jumpin' George
episodes.overview: Georeg plans on never sleeping again when he's plagued by a recurring nightmare. Michael & Stephanie use 'wombphones' to educate their future child.

episodes.name: Lights! Camera! Contractions!
episodes.overview: It's baby time for the Harris' as Steph's baby is about to be born. Michael is determined to capture the birth on tape over Stephanie's objections.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Pest
episodes.overview: Joanna takes an odd man to several houses to try to convince him to buy one, but he just can't seem to commit. Joanna visits his home and walks in to find a shrine dedicated to her.

episodes.name: Good Neighbor Sam
episodes.overview: When an overbearing new neighbor moves next door, Dick finds his polite veneer mistaken for friendship. The townsfolk, who all assume Dick is their best friend, are in an uproar when they hear that Dick and Sam are 'best friends'.

episodes.name: Child in Charge
episodes.overview: Stephanie's parents buy WPIV for baby Stephanie. Dick refuses to pander to the child, forcing baby Steph to cancel Vermont Today in the middle of an interview with George McGovern.

episodes.name: Seein' Double
episodes.overview: Michael announces plans to spice up WPIV's lineup with a new sitcom, Seein' Double starring Stephanie as identical twins Judy and Jody, with Dick as their crotchety widowed father.

episodes.name: Born to Be Mild
episodes.overview: Dick is roped into joining George's old gang, 'The Houligans', when they reunited after 40 years. Dick leads them into a rumble against their long-time rivals, 'The Ruffians'.

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Girl
episodes.overview: After another shopping spree for baby Steph, Dick teaches Michael that materialism isn't the best way to raise a child. A skeptical Michael becomes convinced after a haunting dream depicts a possible future. Julia Duffy plays grown-up baby Steph.

episodes.name: Georgie and Grace
episodes.overview: George falls under the influence of five priests vacationing at the inn. After George announces his intention to join the priesthood, Miss Goddard tries her hardest to change his mind.

episodes.name: Handymania
episodes.overview: George is the toast of the town when he events a hot new board game, ""Handymania"".

episodes.name: Dick and Tim
episodes.overview: Dick finagles his way into a weekly poker game with Tim Conway. Unaware of Tim's cheap nature, Dick drives him away after raising a quarter.

episodes.name: Father Goose
episodes.overview: Michael comes up with the perfect lead-in to Vermont Today, the 'Giddy Goose' show. He casts his favorite dinner theater actor as Giddy, only to discover the man's also his father.

episodes.name: My Husband, My Peasant
episodes.overview: Society bluebloods Scooter Drake and his new wife Libby drop by with a child of their own, apparently superior to baby Steph in every way. Michael and Stephanie decide to divorce due to Michael's peasant heritage.

episodes.name: The Last Newhart
episodes.overview: In the midst of a town meeting, a Japanese visitor announces his intentions to purchase the entire town and turn the land into a gigantic golf course. Everyone but Dick is thrilled and sells out.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: The eighth and final season of Newhart aired on CBS from September 18, 1989 to May 21, 1990.
